text: Anatoliy Vladimirovich Kotenyov is a Belarusian actor. He began his screen career in 1985 and appeared in more than 120 Soviet, Russian, Belarusian and Ukrainian movies and TV series. probably the most important movie, he has played is As Far as My Feet Will Carry Me. ==Biography== He was born in 25 September 1958 in Sukhumi, Abkhaz ASSR, Georgian SSR, Soviet Union. He is married to Svetlana Borovskaya since 1989 and he has two children. ==Filmography== * Deserter (Dezertir) (1997) – Yuriy Muzyka * Sheriff's Star (Zvezda sherifa) (1992) – Nikolai Litus * Matros Zheleznyak (1985) – Vitaliy Dudin * Dezha vyu (1990) – Juliusz Machulski * Chetvyortaya planeta (1995) – Dmitriy Astrakhan * Istanbul Transit (Stambulskiy tranzit) (1993) – Grigori Kokhan * As Far as My Feet Will Carry Me (2001) – Hardy Martins ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sukhumi
title: Anatoliy Kotenyov
